entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Ashley. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return something. I’m not happy with it and it's basically brand new.
I understand. I'm happy to help with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's order number 789456123. And hurry up about it. I don't have all day.
Thank you. Let me pull that up for you. Okay, I see here that you purchased a VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the issue with the smart watch?
The VeloBand Pulse isn't tracking my heart rate accurately, and the sleep tracking is completely off. It’s useless to me. I want to return it.
I understand your frustration. Our return policy is designed to be customer-friendly. I can definitely help you with this return. You're covered under our 90 days policy.
90 days? Okay, that’s good to hear. I was worried because I think it's been a couple of weeks. I just haven’t had time to deal with this until now.

No problem at all. According to our system, you're well within the allowed time frame. Let's proceed with the return. I'll just need to confirm your shipping address. Is 123 Main Street still correct?
Yes, that's correct. Get this done quickly. I want this taken care of.

Perfect. I've processed the return for your VeloBand Pulse. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within the next 24 hours. Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed. You should see the refund reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Great! That sounds easy enough. I appreciate that.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding your VeloFit account or any other VeloFit product?
No, I think that’s everything. Thanks for your help.
You're very welcome. Thank you for choosing VeloFit! Have a wonderful day!
